verbose_text: As the infection progressed (7 dpi), CD46 +/IFNgamma-KO neonates upregulated IFNalpha4 (29-fold) to a greater extent in comparison to CD46+ (7.5-fold) and CD46 +/RAG2-KO (5.7-fold) neonates post-infection, whereas CD46+ adults did not increase the expression of IFNalpha4 significantly (XREF_FIG A, B).
